skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a 40% chance of placing a [Fear] debuff for 1 turn.
skills.name: Wailing Maelstrom

skills.desc: Revives all dead allies with full HP. Places a [Sleep] debuff on this Champion for 1 turn.
skills.name: Reconstruct

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy with 2 random allies. Places a [Block Damage] buff on this Champion for 1 turn if all allies are dead. Allies joining the attack use their default skills.
skills.name: Legion Lord

skills.desc: Immune to [Stun], [Freeze], [Sleep], [Provoke], [Block Active Skills], [Block Passive Skills], [Fear], and [True Fear] debuffs. Also immune to HP exchange effects, HP balancing effects, and cooldown increasing effects.
skills.name: Almighty Immunity [Passive]

skills.desc: Damage from Continuous Damage decreased by 60%.
skills.name: Continuous Damage Resistance II
